amendment.description: An amendment numbered 54 printed in Part C of House Report 118-559 to prohibit funds appropriated or otherwise made available by this Act to be made available to carry out, enforce, or implement the process entitled, "Process to Promote the Unity and Stability of Families", announced by the Department of Homeland Security on June 18, 2024.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Roy amendment (A026) Failed by recorded vote: 193 - 216 (Roll no. 293).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Roy amendment (A026) Failed by recorded vote: 193 - 216 (Roll no. 293).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
